property.name: ANYWHERE
property.shortdesc: Starts in the next available space.

property.name: NEXT_COLUMN
property.shortdesc: Starts at the top of the next column.

property.name: NEXT_FRAME
property.shortdesc: Starts at the top of the next text frame in the thread.

property.name: NEXT_PAGE
property.shortdesc: Starts at the top of the next page.

property.name: NEXT_ODD_PAGE
property.shortdesc: Starts at the top of the next odd-numbered page.

property.name: NEXT_EVEN_PAGE
property.shortdesc: Starts at the top of the next even-numbered page.
